articles.title: South Africa fire: What are Johannesburg's hijacked buildings? - BBC
articles.description: Many blocks in inner-city Johannesburg, the scene of a deadly fire, are deemed unfit to live in.
articles.content:
Many buildings in the centre of the South African city of Johannesburg, where a horrific fire has killed more than 70 people, are deemed unfit to live in.
